查询条件： teacherName，titlename，checkStatus，projectType
select teacherTitleID,titlename,titleOrigin,projectType,reqireStudentNum,year,checkStatus teacherName,majorName from teacherGreDesignTitle t,t_teacher_base_info teacher,t_major_base_info m where t.teacherID=teacher.teacherID and teacher.majorID=m.majorID and teacherName='' and titlename='' and checkStatus='' and projectType='' ;
mapper.update: update teacherGreDesignTitle set graDesignID = #{graDesignID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, titlename = #{titlename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, resultType = #{resultType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, projectType = #{projectType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, targetRequire = #{targetRequire,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, researchContent = #{researchContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, titleOrigin = #{titleOrigin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, titleType = #{titleType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, reqireStudentNum = #{reqireStudentNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, checkStatus = #{checkStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, syear = #{syear,jdbcType=DATE}, applyTime = #{applyTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gdTime = #{gdTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, majorID = #{majorID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, where teacherTitleID=#{teacherTitleID}
mapper.select: SELECT majorName FROM t_major_base_info WHERE majorID = #{majorID}
